infos.info: Hickerson reports that the program was originally broadcast on Radio Luxembourg. - ---------------------- - Dunning and Lackmann report that the program was broadcast first on BBC. - ---------------------- - Dunning indicates the name of the show was The Third Man, subtitled The Lives of Harry Lime.
